TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Yadah_tu_kuni_taydaan_a_nyadu`_ma_ngalay_ci_Hu_kun_ci_apa_dadutus_tu_lalangawen_nu_pinacadan, title = Yadah_tu_kuni_taydaan_a_nyadu`_ma_ngalay_ci_Hu_kun_ci_apa_dadutus_tu_lalangawen_nu_pinacadan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yadah_tu_kuni_taydaan_a_nyadu`_ma_ngalay_ci_Hu_kun_ci_apa_dadutus_tu_lalangawen_nu_pinacadan} }

S.FORM: yadah tu kuni taydaan a nyadu` ma ngalay ci Hu kun ci apa dadutus tu lalangawen nu pinacadan. kakiliman nilacul yadah tu kuni taydaan a nyadu` ma ngalay ci Hu kun ci apa dadutus tu lalangawen nu pinacadan u kinciu nu kilayku ci Hu kun ci yadahtu kuni taydaan nida tu nyadu`tu lalikid . pasunu: kilay si Lasulasutan,Cipawkan；Yusinu bancalay,Mabuwakay, siawtaytung,Talacan,Piycang；Linahem Banaw,Cialupalay,Hupin anyadu`, maydih cinida a padadutus tu lalangawen nu pinacadan,manamuh tayniyan nu katuud day ku nyadu`,kasidayit,kaymawan,misapu tunyadu`, hinisa ci Hu kun ci,u kilay heminsahen manin,adihan aku kukilay atademaw hina talul,kasenunsa miliyas tu kacunuhan aninel,kalamkam misu ayaw tu cahedal,ayda caay kaduka kui nyadu`ay,kukay tuni padihing nutuas,tayni aca kudaesu nu kilay. hacacay han ni Hu kun ci paanin kutumuk saka lalikid a kalisiu,tal kamu cinida,caay kaputun kusidayit aku tubabalaki atu sinkiu nunyadu`ici Sicenwyi yan,ayda tatimul nu kilay anyadu` maladay tu pinacadan mikukay tu paudi pay ulala` utapuku,utuas,mingalal tutuas,papupu tuikilayay a tademaw samihmihcan pinan,samihmihcan lipahak,sa mihmihcan matumes kumihca hakanamuhan sanu inyadu`ay Hu kun ci,lawphan nu katuudday mu liuliuen ami kec lima.Mikukay cinida tuipabaway a tuas mi pupu,saka lipahak nu naluwan,saka kapah nu udip nu babalaki,u mulaay pinan balaki,u kawaw nu kapah macakat macakat.

yadah to koni taydaan a nyado` ma ngalay ci Ho kon ci apa dadotos to lalangawen no pinacadan. kakiliman nilacol yadah to koni taydaan a nyado` ma ngalay ci Ho kon ci apa dadotos to lalangawen no pinacadan o kincio no kilayko ci Ho kon ci yadahto koni taydaan nida to nyado`to lalikid . pasono: kilay si Lasolasotan,Cipawkan；Yosino bancalay,Mabowakay, siawtaytong,Talacan,Piycang；Linahem Banaw,Cialopalay,Hopin anyado`, maydih cinida a padadotos to lalangawen no pinacadan,manamoh tayniyan no katood day ko nyado`,kasidayit,kaymawan,misapo tonyado`, hinisa ci Ho kon ci,o kilay heminsahen manin,adihan ako kokilay atademaw hina talol,kasenonsa miliyas to kaconohan aninel,kalamkam miso ayaw to cahedal,ayda caay kadoka koi nyado`ay,kokay toni padihing notoas,tayni aca kodaeso no kilay. hacacay han ni Ho kon ci paanin kotomok saka lalikid a kalisio,tal kamo cinida,caay kapoton kosidayit ako tobabalaki ato sinkio nonyado`ici Sicenwyi yan,ayda tatimol no kilay anyado` maladay to pinacadan mikokay to paodi pay olala` otapoko,otoas,mingalal totoas,papopo toikilayay a tademaw samihmihcan pinan,samihmihcan lipahak,sa mihmihcan matomes komihca hakanamohan sano inyado`ay Ho kon ci,lawphan no katoodday mo liolioen ami kec lima.Mikokay cinida toipabaway a toas mi popo,saka lipahak no nalowan,saka kapah no odip no babalaki,o molaay pinan balaki,o kawaw no kapah macakat macakat.
